languages.text: "Уничтожили мир-кора..." {n}Джай осекается, а потом торопливо шепчет вам.{/n} "Эй, {name}... если будет возможность — надо разыскать это место. Даже если мир-корабль разнесли в клочья, любой, кто найдет его останки, озолотится".

traits.locale_text: "Уничтожили мир-кора..." {n}Джай осекается, а потом торопливо шепчет вам.{/n} "Эй, {name}... если будет возможность — надо разыскать это место. Даже если мир-корабль разнесли в клочья, любой, кто найдет его останки, озолотится".

languages.text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."
languages.original_text: "Уничтожили мир-кора..." {n}Джай осекается, а потом торопливо шепчет вам.{/n} "Эй, {name}... если будет возможность — надо разыскать это место. Даже если мир-корабль разнесли в клочья, любой, кто найдет его останки, озолотится".

traits.locale_text: "A destroyed Craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the Craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

"A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

"A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

"A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

languages.text: 「壊れた方…」{n}ジェイは言いかけると、慌ててあなたに囁いた。{/n}「ねえ、{name}…チャンスがあれば、その場所を調べるべきだ。方舟が木っ端みじんになってたとしても、破片一つで誰でもぼろ儲けできるじゃない」
languages.original_text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

traits.locale_text: 「壊れた方…」{n}ジェイは言いかけると、慌ててあなたに囁いた。{/n}「ねえ、{name}…チャンスがあれば、その場所を調べるべきだ。方舟が木っ端みじんになってたとしても、破片一つで誰でもぼろ儲けできるじゃない」

languages.text: “被摧毁的方舟世——” {n}婕伊住了口，随后匆忙对你耳语，{/n}“嘿，{name}……如果有机会，我们应该去看看那个地方。就算那个方舟世界被炸成了碎片，如果能找到它的残骸，也足以让我们发笔横财。”
languages.original_text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

traits.locale_text: “被摧毁的方舟世——” {n}婕伊住了口，随后匆忙对你耳语，{/n}“嘿，{name}……如果有机会，我们应该去看看那个地方。就算那个方舟世界被炸成了碎片，如果能找到它的残骸，也足以让我们发笔横财。”

languages.text: «Son restos de un mundo astr...». {n}Jae hace una pausa y luego te susurra apresuradamente.{/n} «Oye, {name}... deberíamos echar un vistazo a este sitio si tenemos ocasión. Aunque el mundo astronave esté hecho pedazos, hasta el más pequeño valdrá una fortuna».
languages.original_text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

traits.locale_text: «Son restos de un mundo astr...». {n}Jae hace una pausa y luego te susurra apresuradamente.{/n} «Oye, {name}... deberíamos echar un vistazo a este sitio si tenemos ocasión. Aunque el mundo astronave esté hecho pedazos, hasta el más pequeño valdrá una fortuna».

languages.text: "Ein zerstörtes Weltensch..." {n}Jae bricht ab und flüstert dir dann rasch zu:{/n} "Hey, {name} ... Wenn wir die Gelegenheit erhalten, sollten wir uns diesen Ort ansehen. Selbst wenn das Weltenschiff explodiert ist, wird jeder reich, der ein Stück davon findet."
languages.original_text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

traits.locale_text: "Ein zerstörtes Weltensch..." {n}Jae bricht ab und flüstert dir dann rasch zu:{/n} "Hey, {name} ... Wenn wir die Gelegenheit erhalten, sollten wir uns diesen Ort ansehen. Selbst wenn das Weltenschiff explodiert ist, wird jeder reich, der ein Stück davon findet."

languages.text: « Quelqu'un a détruit un vaisseau-m... » {n}Jae s'interrompt, puis vous murmure précipitamment :{/n} « Dites, {name}... Si l'occasion se présente, nous devrions aller jeter un coup d'œil à cet endroit. Même si ce monde a volé en éclats, il suffirait d'en trouver un seul morceau pour faire fortune. »
languages.original_text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

traits.locale_text: « Quelqu'un a détruit un vaisseau-m... » {n}Jae s'interrompt, puis vous murmure précipitamment :{/n} « Dites, {name}... Si l'occasion se présente, nous devrions aller jeter un coup d'œil à cet endroit. Même si ce monde a volé en éclats, il suffirait d'en trouver un seul morceau pour faire fortune. »

languages.text: "Yok olan bir gemidü... {n}Jae aniden sunup aceleyle fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ya {name}... Fırsat bulursak bir bakalım derim. Gemidünya un ufak olmuşsa bile, bir parçasını dahi bulsak köşeyi döneriz."
languages.original_text: "A destroyed craftw—" {n}Jae breaks off, and then hurriedly whispers to you,{/n} "Hey, {name}... If we get a chance, we should check this place out. Even if the craftworld was blasted to bits, anyone who finds a piece of it will make a fortune."

traits.locale_text: "Gemidünyayı yok mu..." {n}Jae aniden sunup aceleyle fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ya {name}... Fırsat bulursak bir bakalım derim. Gemidünya un ufak olduysa bir parçasını bile bulsak köşeyi döneriz."
